name: Protect the Village [StaySafeJam]
description:
Protect your village from the dangers of the outside world and keep everyone safe.

My first GameJam - I probably had more fun making this than you will have playing it.. but enjoy!

There is a major bug currently, that makes the build version play 10x faster than it was in the editor.. so uh, sharpen your reflexes..

Here is a Reupload that fixes the error above:
https://lacront.itch.io/protect-the-village-reupload
